TextView.android:text: With its 55 percent reduction, Google Smart Application Update reduces traffic to 62 Pbytes (138 ×0.45), but DELTA++at 77 percent sav-ings pushes that reduction another 22 percent to 32 Pbytes (138 ×0.23). If 33 percent of updates are through Wi-Fi, the extra savings in cellular networks is approximately 20 Pbytes. Accord-ing to a 2012 report by CTIA, 8 US wireless data trafic in the first half of 2012 was 590 Pbytes, translating to approximately 1,180 Pbytes per year. Thus, our savings of roughly 20 Pbytes represents more than 1.7 percent of all cellular trafic — a signigcant savings.
